property.name: header
property.value: ^<\?xml.*\?>$\n^<!-- Copyright \(C\) (\d\d\d\d-)?2014 K Team. All Rights Reserved. -->$

property.name: header

property.name: header

property.name: header
property.value: ^/\* Copyright \(C\) (\d\d\d\d-)?2014 K Team. All Rights Reserved. \*/$

property.name: header

property.name: header

property.name: header
